text: Gymnophthalmus leucomystax, the white spectacled tegu, is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is found in Brazil and Guyana. ==References== Category:Gymnophthalmus Category:Reptiles of Brazil Category:Reptiles of Guyana Category:Reptiles described in 1991 Category:Taxa named by Paulo Vanzolini Category:Taxa named by Celso Morato de Carvalho
title: Gymnophthalmus leucomystax
